column8: Arborio rice;Mushrooms;Parmesan cheese;Onion;Garlic;Vegetable broth;White wine;Olive oil;Butter;Parsley
column11: Heat olive oil and butter in a pan;Add chopped onions and garlic, sautÃ© until translucent;Add mushrooms and cook until soft;Stir in Arborio rice and cook for 2 minutes;Pour in white wine and stir until absorbed;Gradually add vegetable broth, stirring constantly;Cook until rice is creamy and tender;Stir in Parmesan cheese and parsley;Serve hot
